website_summaries.verdict: A spacious smart feeder that has a mid-level price, keeps food fresh, and works with numerous devices.
pros: Double locking unit does a great job keeping food fresh
Large size can hold up to 6 pounds of food
Easy to set up and operate with iPhone or Android smartphones
cons: A few reports of connectivity issues

customer_reviews.title: worth the $$, love it
customer_reviews.text: this feeder is great, both of us work long days and there were times we forgot to feed the kitties in the morning which naturally made us feel terrible. Having this product has made our lives so much easier and feeding the cats is one less thing to think about. Great product, made very well, and it works! The youngest cat loves it, as soon as she hears the bits hit the bowl she takes off. Very, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: john rose

customer_reviews.title: I wasted 6 hours and the app still didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the app is a disaster. Dealing with China to try to get it to work was another disaster. After spending over 6 hours trying to get it to work I surrendered. (I am pretty tech savvy). My last email from China asked if I was using ios13, if so switch to 12 or an Android phone! Obviously they have not updated their app.
customer_reviews.author: trvlnnancy

customer_reviews.title: Good product (for a little while), bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what you would expect it to do, but for only a few months. I bought my feeders in September, and they were easy to set up and even easier to use, but after just four months of regular use, the door got stuck open without any jam or clear cause. Now the device won’t operate, and PETKIT’s customer service has ignored my emails for over a week past the advertised “24 hour response” they guarantee. If their customer service was half as good as they make it seem, this would be a 5-star review, but since I can’t get repair advice, I don’t plan to buy anything else from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I went on a short trip and I needed a feeder for my little kitty. This is super easy to setup and track my cat meals with exact portions. My cat runs as soon as she hears the feeder turning on. 😄 I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, need more flexible portion sizing
customer_reviews.text: Great pet feeder that I can control with my app as well as program for times feeding when I’m not home. Only thing is I wish the portion sizes were more customizable (only has a number of set sizes) or does an automatic division based on a “per day” serving - eg I wish I could just program “1 cup” and “3 meals”, and it would just divide it to 0.3333 cup. But the closest is 3/10 which is fine I guess but not quite a full cup by the end of the day. My kitten seems to like to loaf in it too so I guess that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy app won't connect - can't program manually
customer_reviews.text: You have to use their updated app, which is not currently approved by the Google Play Store, in order to use this feeder. I couldn't get the feeder to connect by Wi-Fi using the older, safe version of the app, which still requires way too many permissions. No response to my email to their 24-7 support. There's no way to manually program this feeder. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk Product
customer_reviews.text: Never could get this to work. Exchanged multiple emails with the support group, and could not ever get it to connect to my google mesh. On a product which is solely designed to work form the App, that made the product completely useless. The one good thing I have to say about this is that I found out it was a piece of junk early on, and returned it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Rader

customer_reviews.title: Great Feeder
customer_reviews.text: So we just setup this feeder. Seems like a great feeder. The portions look accurate compared to other feeders I've used. Took me extra time to setup WiFi. and if you use the manual feeder, remember to HOLD the button down for the duration of the feed. Overall - great feeder! much more compact and sits better next to our other PetKit water fountain! Our kitty loves them both!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Terrible app, security nightmare
customer_reviews.text: First, you can't program unless you use the app, which I didn't realize and is a deal breaker for me. An app that gets less than 2 stars on Google Apps. Next, you have to create an account in the app with multiple bits of personal information. Then you have to give it your wifi password, in a clear text input box, as part of the setup. A ridiculous amount of network and personal information just to configure feedings. I couldn't even give it my wifi password because it has spaces and their app won't allow you to enter a wifi password with a space.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kessel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good product when it got delivered on April 17th 2020, but then now on June 11th 2020 the motor is completely burnt out and it's just a fancy food hooper now. I have reached out to Petkit to see if they will do something about this, and will update my review if they do, until then my only advice it to not buy this product for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: eragon9199

customer_reviews.title: Cat's waiting for the food to drop
customer_reviews.text: This auto feeder is wonderful. I had another brand that was complicated and difficult to change the portioning. This feeder has lots of choices of portion size and I can schedule them as often as I want, all from my smart phone. It is also very easy to clean and the food compartment has a gasket to keep the food fresh. My cat has learned the feeding times and now goes and sits in front of it about 5 to 10 minutes before the food drops. It's really cute. I highly recommend this feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Quilt Mom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this unless you want to risk all the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and customer service is awful. They have stopped dispensing food as scheduled. Completely unpredictable. Log is also inaccurate. I have to review security camera footage daily to see if my cats ate. Customer service gives you the run around and in the end only says the ap is not perfect and “needs time”. What???
customer_reviews.author: DMD

customer_reviews.title: Must give up privacy
customer_reviews.text: You MUST enable location services to use the device. No thanks. If you are reading this DO NOT enable location services. Return the device.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to be able to feed my always hungry cat small treats multiple times a day. This works prefect! She hears it begin to dispense and will launch herself at it! It keeps me from having to get up wavy couple hours. If I leave food out she would just gorge. I use freeze dried tidbits in it so it’s not very accurate on how much it dispenses, but it doesn’t have to be accurate for how we use it. I tried kibble and that worked much better, but my cat can’t eat it. She’s a handful that’s for sure! This has extremely easy setup, cleaning, and the app is fool proof! Would definitely recommend and purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! Worst costumer service I’ve ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my cats and they worked perfectly for the first 3 months. I unplugged them when I was moping and when I plugged them back in, they didn’t work. The app said they were disconnected from the WiFi but no matter what I do, I can’t get them to reconnect. I’ve contacted PETKIT with at least 6 emails and haven’t heard back at all, and of course I’m just pasted the Amazon return window to send them back. I’m extremely frustrated and unhappy with this purchase and their absolute HORRIBLE customer service. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Dinberg

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE repackaged used items
customer_reviews.text: We were excited about this product and saw that it had good reviews. This excitement quickly faded when when the box arrived with large cardboard squares cut out of it where a label had previously been put for the first person that ordered this. We paid for a NEW item, yet small remnants of cat food fell from the device as we opened it up. Had we intended to get a used item we would have selected one of the used items available at a discount... pretty shady to pay full price for someone else’s used return. We have yet to set up this item and aren’t sure if we will keep it, but not off to a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Cox Family

customer_reviews.title: Its gone downhill after a month.
customer_reviews.text: This product started out great. Then game the PetKit app update on March 11, 2020. Things went downhill quickly. Noticed a lot of loss of connectivity. I'm using a Deco M9 mesh extender that works perfectly with my 2.4ghz webcam. So as you can see from my pic, I tried to adjust the feeding schedule to add one more meal. Well instead of overwriting the meal plan, it just adds on to whatever is there. It also thinks that the future meals have already been missed. FIX YOUR APP.
customer_reviews.author: T. C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! Was a little skeptical at first to be honest. But this product exceeded my expectations and I’m glad it did. It’s perfect for my work schedule and I can adjust the portion size super easy. Can add breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Also if I want to give him a little snack, I can do that too. There’s also a manual feed button if I want to give him a little extra after dinner or whatever to make the little guy happy. Super easy to use as well. I 100% recommend this product love it. Also
customer_reviews.author: Jbone25

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!  CONNECTION ISSUES!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this product was well rated, look at all of the reviews/questions that mention connection issues!! Somehow I missed them. Mine would never connect despite many attempts and placing the unit right next to my router. No connection mean no way to program, so absolutely useless. It's going back pronto.
customer_reviews.author: barefootgirl

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern!
customer_reviews.text: I love this feeder so much! This is actually my first experience with an automatic pet feeder, so I don’t have any others to compare it to, but overall I think this product is amazing! The convenience of creating a feeding schedule right on my phone is awesome! I haven’t attempted to clean it yet, as it is still pretty full. Looking at it when it was empty, it seems that cleaning might be a bit of a task, but I’ll update this review when we cross that bridge. All in all, it was reasonably priced for what it does, looks sleek and modern and shipped quickly. 5 stars all around! ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that will over eat and vomit if you fill her bowl with food. Trying to feed her enough but not too much had become a chore. That's when we purchased the Petkit Mini Feeder, and it's made my life much easier. It can be programmed to dispense as much food and as often as needed. You can also manually feed, which is recorded by the dispense and listed in your app. It also gives low food warnings so you can make sure there isn't an issue. Everything has worked perfectly in the two months I've been using the feeder and would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Smackmeister

customer_reviews.title: Best auto feeder I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to jinx it because it’s only been a few days but this thing is awesome. Cats can’t get in like they did with our other feeder. Super sleek and pretty. App is relatively easy to use. I love that I can feed them remotely. It even sends you a notification to say feeding was successful. One thing to improve is the English in the app—some is wonky. Need to hire a better translator! I am praying this does not break easily and become an expensive piece of junk like some of these electronic things are. If not, it is one of the best things I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: dms47

customer_reviews.title: Little expensive but worth the peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Oh how helpful it has been. With my crazy schedule at work I am not able to feed my cat on same time but this has changed the game . I set timings of the feeding and viola it dispenses dry food at those times . Doesn't matter what time I get home , I know my cat has been fed on time and I get a notification on the app that confirms . That's one less thing I have to worry about.. also he doesn't wake me up early in the morning for food!!! You need 2.4 GHz connection for the app to work & it is sleek stylish to look at .
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good and solid automatic feeder
customer_reviews.text: I have this running for couple weeks now. It is smarter than I thought. It reminds you when the food is running now. It reminds you to change the silica gel pack every 30 days. It notifies you every time it dispenses food. Battery level notification etc. Highly customization portion sizes as well as frequency. The food tray is magnetic clipped on, so you can wash the tray and snap it back in easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Works well for an auto feeder
customer_reviews.text: We used this feeder while on vacation for the cat. It works great, the app allows you to set up the feedings and tells you when it is dispensing. We only had one issue - when the tray gets full of food it piles up and causes the feeder to stop dispensing. It was all good after we adjusted the portion sizes. The app was good at telling us it was jammed so we were able to fix it before it became a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Won’t connect. Bad support.
customer_reviews.text: This device doesn’t work and doesn’t connect to WiFi. Same issue with other users with it stopping at 55%. I tried 2 devices and same result. Customer support only gives you the same directions that are already included. I have other devices that operate only on 2.4ghz with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Super Efficient / Effective! (Just set up on proper WiFi)
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver! If you travel / work a lot, this feeder is clutch. It has a sleek design, is easy to clean, and pretty quiet relatively speaking. There is an app you need to set up the feeder and create a "meal plan" with portion amounts which is super easy. The only tricky part is making sure you are on a 2.4Ghz Wifi and not a 5Ghz Wifi frequency when you first set it up. After I set it up, I switched back over and it totally works fine. Everything is controllable from my phone which is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Great would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Received the product today and loved it so does my pet. It took a while to connect to the WiFi but after I got it everything works great. You can program 3 meals/ day plus snacks. It sets reminders, gives you appropriate feeing guidelines for your animals age ,breed and weight. You can track when the meals were dispensed and amount given. You can also take advantage of the social aspect of the app to connect with other users if you want(Optional). Over all it’s a great product. I would buy again and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Baga

customer_reviews.title: Can't connect with IOS 13
customer_reviews.text: I have spent three days communicating with the customer service and still can't connect the feeder with my phone. A waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: I haaaate being woken up at 5 in the morning
customer_reviews.text: I just need 30 more minutes but my cat tends to just stick his little body on top of my face at 5 am. Now he is so programed to know his feeding time that he is ready before the machine actually distributes the food. Also my cat throws up from eating too fast, now I get about 8 kibbles every 10 minutes, and it gives my cat time to digest it. It's a simple mechanism, nothing fast. Reasonable price. And has yet to let me down. I've had it for about a month or 2 now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!! And great app UI with minor connection issue
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It truly saved my life for working whole day and use the app to feed my dogs. I have my own camera to monitor their activities. It would actually be great if this one has its own camera then I don’t need to switch in between different apps but anyway still manageable for me. The only part bothered me was the initial setup wifi connection. It took me 1hr at least to finally connect to the machine. Followed the instruction, reboot router, reset, moved the feeder next to the router, reinstall app, etc. and finally it connected and so far so good. Happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ekacina

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I got this when PetNet went out of business and I needed a replacement. This is just as good as that one ever was, and I like its small size, even if it means I'm re-filling it every two weeks instead of every month. My only complaint is the design of the lid, when I refill it, kibble often falls both into the notch by the power button and the notch where the latch is, which prevents it from closing, and I have to pull the kibble out. It's a small oversight but something I notice every single time I refill the feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Dulax

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this feeder today and so far I love it! the design is so sleek and modern! where is food comes out its sealed until its feeding time. so there is no way any bugs can come in. the food tray and super easy to clean! the app is very user friendly was able to set it up in a breeze without any issues! I like the backup battery source! if we lose power my cat will still get fed!! I do which instead of AA batteries the battery source was built in! but can't go wrong with this feeder I highly highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review as I have to say this is a great company to work with. My first feeder had an impellar malfunction and the company sent me a new machine. Unfortunately, the new machine would not hook up to wall power because the adapter was missing. Instead of sending an adapter, they sent me more machines. I hooked up the new one and it works perfectly again so life is good with me and my kitty. This product is great and the company stands behind their products 100% plus they are very responsive to customer needs. I am very pleased with my experience and grateful for such great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Fancy pieces of junk
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, these feeders seem nice until your cats figure out they can practically bite the food dispensing door off and break the motor for the door. We’ve only had them for two months and the door on one feeder barely opens and the app says that there is something blocking it. No customer service whatsoever, sent 3 emails and tried calling the China number with no answer. It is absurd that these $100 dollar feeders break so quickly and that there’s no way to contact anyone about getting a replacement. If I could give zero stars I would. Do not buy, pieces of junk.
customer_reviews.author: ~G

customer_reviews.title: Great except one minor thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat because he kept eating too fast, then getting sick. The feeder has pretty much resolved that problem. The feeder itself is awesome, but I'm disappointed there are no push notifications to your phone. I didn't think I would have to open the app to see if it was empty. I would do 4.5 stars if possible for this minor annoyance. Hopefully petkit will add push notifications someday. I have figured out that the cat food last 10 days so for now I will just use the calendar app on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey S.

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to set up, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I am not home all the time and my brother is but he is unreliable and plus he thinks he is Jenny Craig and needs to slim down the heavy one and beef up the slim one. I can't trust that. I am very tech savvy but I didn't realize my smart phone had to be so close to the feeder to get the internal network to connect. Once connected and I set up my feeding plan I am very happy. I have been working with the plan a little to get it where I need it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: The app drops two stars
customer_reviews.text: So, the machine itself: it's adorable. It's compact. It's relatively noise free (I have had some feeders that sounded like a literal dinner bell). No complaints there. Now, the app: it is clunky, it is frustrating, it is unintuitive. Connecting the feeder to it was a nightmare. Adding and deleting feeding times is a headache. The app is so proud of itself with its social media-esque outlay and dietary "help". It's all just clutter.
customer_reviews.author: IJR

customer_reviews.title: Great product post needed initial replacement
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome deal and feeder while it lasted. Unfortunately the feeder door after a week no longer opens correctly and the unit requires this door to work well or it jams or won’t release food. The door seems very flimsy with a very week motor for eh door hatch. Update: Contacted customer service who quickly answered (~24 hrs later, diagnosed and corrected the issue which was related to a faulty stripped metal motor sprocket. A replacement was received and has been working for almost 2 weeks. No further issues allow for providing for happy cat owner and well timed food delivery for our pet.
customer_reviews.author: Dathan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got Petkit Smart Feed Automatic Cat Feeder almost 2 weeks ago. It was very easy to set up even though my WiFI kept trying to default to 5G, which the directions clearly state it does not support. It was easy to customize the times and amounts of each feeding. I set up 5 feeds spread thru out the day. My cat at first was weary but now he comes running when he hears the food hitting the plate. The top area where the food goes into is some what hard to open but that means if the cat tips it over the food is contained. I am very happy with this pet feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen K

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't connect from my phone. No issues with bfs phone. Able to do everything else from my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is I couldn't connect them with my phone. I have 3 and had to use boyfriends phone to connect them. Once connected I could do everything from my phone (feed, skip, make adjustments). But same complaint as everyone else that connecting was difficult from my phone only. Which was weird. They work very well and I have been overall pleased with them since I bought them 5 months ago. I do wish more than one person could be signed in to the account at once. If my bf tries to make a change and signs in on his phone, it signs out on my phone. This is a minor/personal problem/preference.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: A HUGE improvement from my previous automatic pet feeder! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to operate than my previous automatic feeder. Great customer service. They always respond to my emails within 24 hours, or to a call. Receiving confirmations of each meal on my iPhone app is handy, and comfort me to know that my kitty has been fed. Super easy to clean in the dishwasher. Magnetic dish is great. It will attach itself to the unit without me having to struggle to find the best fit. This comes in handy when my daughter’s dogs come to visit. I can easily detach the dish portion of the feeder. Also, easy to unplug and use on battery mode without having to reprogram it. A well designed and engineered product!
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Threat Feeder-App Problems
customer_reviews.text: This feeder is wonderful- but I’m disappointed that my partner and I can’t both be connected to the feeder app. The app only allows one person to be logged on at a time (it will kick the second person off) but we both like to have our kitties meals monitored. I wish the app could allow us both to stay logged on :-( Other than that the feeder works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Julias Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and great for cats that pick at their food bowl
customer_reviews.text: This feeder was super easy to set up and start using, and all the parts that need cleaning easily detach too. I bought this because my last feeder had an open hole where the food came out and my cat would stick her arm up it and get food out all the time. The door on this feeder completely fixes that problem and I couldn't recommend this more if you're having the same issue. All around great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Iding

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to setup, a little difficult to operate via Alexa though
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: The product works great and connected for us without issue (though it went down once because their app server went down temporarily, but kept feeding on schedule). Otherwise it has worked marvelously and was easy to setup. Only real issue was the language barrier with Alexa. It doesn’t recognize fairly normal english requests and requires you to use some bit odd vernacular at time “Alexa, feed 1/5th cup” vs “1/5th of a cup” and doesnt really recognize 1/4th or 1/10th or “a quarter cup” and such. I think so far only “feed 1/5th cup” has worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B

customer_reviews.title: Wifi Connection is a Pain but it Works
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problem that a lot of people had with wifi. I was this close to sending it back but I tried again for the twentieth time and it worked. I would suggest reset EVERYTHING: router, internet and the Pet feeder. VERY IMPORTANT*****Make sure the light is flashing quickly when you connect and if it doesn't work disconnect router, and modem and KEEP TRYING!.*** I'm so, so glad I didn't return it. It's been a game-changer. I no longer get woken up in the morning! Miles (my cat) had disassociated me from his food! It's also very beautiful and sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Cleverby

customer_reviews.title: Best Automatic Feeder! Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This is the best feeder hands down. The storage area holds a lot of food and keeps it fresh. I have only had this for two days and already wish I had purchased this sooner. My cub wakes me every night between 2 and 3 for a snack and thanks to this amazing feeder I had my first night of peaceful sleep. Knowing that it has battery backup in case the power goes out brings peace of mind. I would definitely recommend this to anyone lucky enough to be owned by a cat.
customer_reviews.author: MS08

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for starving cats
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had a different type of feeder and my macgyver of a cat learned he could jam his paw all up in there and get goodies. So he would constantly be bashing the feeder trying to get its tasty morsels. I had enough and finally picked up this beauty. He is stumped and a little startled by the door that pops open to feed him but he has so far at least in the first 12 hours not figured out how to open it yet....yet. All around a good machine for feeding your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J W

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder and excellent customer serivce!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of this automatic pet feeder. It does exactly as advertised and my cat loves running to the feeder when the food dispenses. My feeder stopped working after 3 months, but the customer service was excellent and they sent me a replacement very quickly. This feeder is great because it allows you to set specific times for the food to dispense, and ensures that your pet will be fed even if you are gone during usual feeding times! I am very happy with this feeder and think their customer service is excellent! I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 2 months then just quit working all together! It won't turn on or anything! at first, I thought it was just the outlet so I tried another one. It's completely dead! For the amount of money, I spent on this id expect it to last ALOT LONGER. I either want my money back or a replacement! Updating my review. Customer service was very helpful In helping me resolve the problem. They sent me a replacement. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Z.

customer_reviews.title: Best feeder of the 5 different ones I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: Great feeder and I’ve tried many with varying degrees of success. I appreciate the silicone rings on the food container and door to ensure the food stays fresh. I also like how it will notify you when the food is low, or the desiccant packet needs to be changed. I generally use the scheduled functionality, but the manual feature is also nice to use. I didn’t have any issues hooking it up to my network, Orbi mesh. The sleek look is also better than many of the other options on the market.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Feeder has good cost
customer_reviews.text: The feeder works very nice! Pros: It has a solid build, never saw it jamming. You can schedule the portions by time and amount. There are a manual feeding through a button and through the app. Since I have a camera already, the feeder has a excellent cost. Cons: The app(android) needs to be improved. The initial wifi connection was difficult and I needed several tries (after that it went smooth though). The app also asks unnecessary permissions. Update Oct 29: My top cap got damaged by my pet. I contacted the manufacturer and they sent me very quickly a used feeder to replace the part. I am positively impressed by the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: mayler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this for the ease of being able to connect it to my phone. It is perfect! The app can be a little confusing to figure out (some translation issues) but if I can do it, anyone can. My kitties come running when they hear the kibble hitting the bowl. I also love the sleek design, and the fact I don’t have to scoop food 100 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: major technical flaws do not allow this item to be linked to our phones
customer_reviews.text: Unable to link this item with my I phone or my wife's new Samsung 9. Don't purchase this unless you are an IT wiz!!! Would give it 0 stars if I could. I must admit however that the manufacturer was responsive to my emails in a very timely fashion. However with no support staff in the USA it was not workable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 6 months then just stopped
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product in April 2020. I had no issues with the device and was very pleased with it until recently. I unplugged it to clean it and once I plugged back in it was no longer accepting WiFi. The manual stated to click reset button and it will start blinking to get back on WiFi. It’s happened before, but I got it back on WiFi pretty quick. This time, it never sync back up. I emailed several listed email addresses for the company and no response. Very disappointed as I was happy until it stopped working out of nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha R.

customer_reviews.title: This is a game changer pet feeder!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my cats and love them. Very user friendly. Easy to unbox and set up. Took about 30 minutes for both units. My cats got used to them very quickly and now they mostly meow at the feeder instead of us constantly. Each unit holds about 2 weeks worth of food which is perfect for our trips away. The app is easy to understand and I love that I can manually push an additional snack for them and then seeing how much food in total they have consumed for the day. Great concept and execution for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Hovis

customer_reviews.title: Great for small to medium dogs. Good design.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, minimalist design which is what I was looking for. Looks like an Apple device with the feed door shaped and positioned how it is. I am not sure why this particular model is shown mostly with cats. The bowl and portion sizes are definitely large enough for a small to medium dog. The only thing I didn't like was the app permissions are super intrusive, and there is no Google Assistant support just yet. I would have easily given 5 stars if not the intrusive permissions and lack of Google Assistant support.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Don’t hesitate, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, wow, wow. I’m in love with this machine! I work nights but my cats always wake up around 7:00am for breakfast. Getting up after a few hours of sleep has been problematic for me. I saw this and thought I’d give it a try. I’m very glad I did because I can now sleep in knowing my cats will be fed. I can also see this being great for when I’m out running errands all day but still want to make sure my cats are fed on time. I actually ordered another one for my other cat! Seriously, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Klani0220

customer_reviews.title: Great for a cat
customer_reviews.text: I had the PetNet and never liked it for my cat. It would have constant issues connecting, dispensing would not happen or would jam. So far this feeder has been great. Always on time and hasn't jammed once. I think the portion size might be a little on the high side, but I just dialed it back which is fine. All in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Busy Cat Parent
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pet feeder. Allow busy pet parent to be at ease that their fur baby fed. Now with this, I can leave a weekend and my cat is taken care of Pro- - portion feeding - app control - Wifi Connectivity - On time - Works even when WIFI down - Backup energy source - Secure , Pet can't get to it - Keeps pet food smell in Con - No camera.
customer_reviews.author: Unity and Company

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Does claim it's running low/empty on food while it still has enough food but that's not really a complaint. One thing I wish existed was the ability to hit a button on my phone to feed them out of schedule. But so far it works great. Though my younger cat keeps knocking the feeding dish away from the machine lol.
customer_reviews.author: Tayhlia

customer_reviews.title: Stop configuring at 55%. Ask for locations
customer_reviews.text: Has to return it as it failed configuration at 55%. Try 2 cellphones didn’t work. I happened to understand Chinese so broken English translation was not an issue. But yet. I don’t know why this thing can’t sync. Another issue is this asked way too much information. I don’t understand why I need to allow the app to access my location while using it. You are not a map! Lastly, you can’t program directly on machine. If you can’t linked the app. This thing can only do manually.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but getting ‘Peace of Mind’’
customer_reviews.text: I can't agree more with the other reviews, this is a great automatic cat feeder. A very good product although pricey but gives you peace of mind with the app use scheduling feed times. The only flaw so far is I am finding is that the manual push button to dispense food is not working, otherwise I like that I can set a feed schedule and receive notifications on my phone that it is working and food was dispensed.
customer_reviews.author: DjW

customer_reviews.title: Good but Wi-fi setup slightly difficult.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little finicky in trying to get it to connect to Wi-Fi. Took several tries to get it to connect. App seems ok but wasn't as easy as it should be to use it to connect the Wi-Fi. Wondering if it will reconnect to Wi-fi by itself if power or Wi-fi goes out or if I'll have to go through the setup again. I like that it allows for very small portions to be dispensed. Can dispense food manually or through the app. Allows scheduling of several meals.

customer_reviews.title: Petkit commitment - Thank you
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED (3/14/2020): I got a response from Petkit and the server connection issues died down. Petkit, thank you for reaching out to me. For a very long time I am extremely loyal to your products - please don't lose that. Our furry animals deserve the best since they only live so few years. I still love your products. A better translation would be nice. We still want to buy more products to come. LAST REVIEW (3/2/2020): Malware. Spyware. Doesn't work. Server busy. Starving pets. Do not buy. China spy app. They just did an update and not works because "server busy". My dogs don't get fed now. I brought 2 of these.
customer_reviews.author: William Tran

customer_reviews.title: allows us to sleep in...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was waking us at 5 am to be fed, but with this auto-feeder, she just sits by it now and waits for it to dispense instead of meowing at us. The amount dispensed is consistent, and a scheduled feeding has never been missed that we know of. I had a little trouble pairing it with my phone, but got it eventually. The video is marginally helpful. Haven't tried it yet traveling, but look forward to relying on it as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Janis D.

customer_reviews.title: A lot troubles ........
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfect until 6 months later...... one day all of sudden the device is offline, I can’t track my pet’s diet anymore. When I tried to reset the network with the device, it suddenly showed 5G WiFi is not supportable, but I have not changed my WiFi plan. And it’s meaningless to have the decide if I can’t control on my phone ....................
customer_reviews.author: Ai Panda (Amenda)

customer_reviews.title: you CANNOT get this thing programmed
customer_reviews.text: i've tried on four WIFI, four locations, multiple times. It wont get past 50% load for the software. its crap. if you want a cool looking feeder that all you can do is hold down the button for one minute to get enough food for a fat cat, that's all you're going to get.
customer_reviews.author: flannelpj

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to connect big let down
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I had to return it. I cannot get it to connect to my wifi on my 5g or 2g. I kept getting a failed attempt message and finally gave up. Realizing I am better off getting a feeder that would connect to bluetooth and I can control from my phone. It was really nicely packed and super clean when I opened it. If you can get it to work that's great
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Smart automation and easy hygiene
customer_reviews.text: Must use the app to program the device! Lots of portion sizes. Tracks the program in a “blog” display. I like to check the blog when I am traveling. Sends notifications when food is low and also when you need to buy food. The manual feed/snack button can easily be trigger by a pet, but can be turned off in the app. I really like that the feed door closes after it depenses food, so cat paws can’t “dig” for more food. The magnetic food tray comes off for easy cleanings. The replaceable descant keeps food fresh and I think it also helps to deter ants.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat who will eat untill he's sick if you leave food down for him. We've tried other times feeders but this one is nice for the fact that it gives you notifications on your phone when it needs to be filled. I highly recommend it. It allows more feeding times than we could use and allows you to make many different measurements
customer_reviews.author: kris McRaney

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!! No issues! You will not regret
customer_reviews.text: This has been literally one of the best purchase of this year!! It saves you so much time and my cat is so happy so get her food on time everyday, the machine looks modern, it is not too big and I have received a lot of compliments about it, PETKIT is my favorite brand, I do have the fountain as well so mi cat is %100 spoiled!
customer_reviews.author: Ferggiecoll

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My cat will wake me up every day at 5:35am...... NO MORE!!! I can sleep now LoL. I set food feeding at 5:15 am so now she gets her food and I get to sleep. It was a bit annoying to set up the wifi, but after a bit of frustration I got it to sync. it has been a month and I'm very happy with the product. it took about 5 days to break the cats routine of me feeding them and go to the feeder. Now they take turns to eat, its very cute. I only got 1 feeder for 2 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Florencia

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I think that’s deserved a review. I bought my first one for my two cats when need to trip for 4 days( figured a way to feed two at a time). I really like the design that it can close the door cause one of my cats learned how to get food from another Auto feeder before. App works good. Now they have one for their own. It reminds me for refill and change desiccant.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Feeder works better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two (2) feeder for our cats. Setup was a little tricky because instructions are not clear. The cell phone you use to initially setup the feeder MUST be on the same 2.4GHz WiFi network for the setup to work. Once the feeder is programmed you can switch to any WiFi network (ie 5GHz). Once the feeder is setup it has worked flawlessly. Quality build and stylish design.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Daniels

customer_reviews.title: The Best So Far
customer_reviews.text: Great cat feeders as they are improvements from my previous ones. These come with an adapter for the outlet which is great because I'm not burning through batteries like my old feeder. The food is secure, and the cats can't get to it. The app works well enough, and it has plenty of options. One issue is that the quantity of food that comes out is dependent on the size of the food. 1/10 cup of small sized food is almost twice as much as 1/10 cup of larger sizes food after remeasuring it.An improvement would be accepting both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Wi-Fi. If there are any issues in the future, I will update.
customer_reviews.author: OMT

customer_reviews.title: nice Product and good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got missing parts and the box looked used when I got it first time. However the. customer service has been very involved and delivered my replacement very quickly. Now I am very satisfied with the product. Very neat design and my cat gets used to it very quickly. The setting up is very easy and user friendly. Wish it could support voice control alexia or Siri in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: PURRFECT feeder for my Superfatso!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! Similar to other posts I have a cat that can’t have his bowl empty. Now I can set the feeder to disburse the applicable amount at the precise times. It took a few days but now he hears the food coming out and goes flying through the house! Haven’t solved the early morning feeding yet as he can’t hear it downstairs but hoping like Pavlovs Dog he starts sitting there waiting for it and not waking me up. The app is very easy to use and nicely laid out. Great product and setup was very clear and easy as well!
customer_reviews.author: MHoff

customer_reviews.title: Can’t connect
customer_reviews.text: Another reviewer who cannot connect to the app. Nothing wrong with my WiFi. Made in China? Japan? Instructions and help lost in translation- don’t make sense. Returning!! and will look for something made in the USA 🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Cindyrella

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just received the Mini feeder and it’s perfect for what I needed. My cat immediately liked it and knows the sound of the food coming down so she runs to it. The build quality is amazing. You could tell they took their time with it. The mobile app is user friendly. It’s only been a day but it’s excellent. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get to sleep thought the night.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a cat like mine that you cannot let free feed or they will eat it all at one time, this is great. My cat likes his 3:00 AM snack and does not care if you are fast asleep. With this feeder, I set the times to feed and let it do its work. When my cat hears the food drop, away he goes.
customer_reviews.author: KittyCat9496

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Clean app.
customer_reviews.text: I got one from the seller about a month ago that has a malfunctioning door. The seller quickly replaced the feeder for me and I have had no issues since. This is a five star product, but I took off one star because I am uncertain how reliable it may be or how common defects are. Either way, mines works great now and I would recommend it. And if you get a defective one, contact seller ASAP before you starve your cat.
customer_reviews.author: melsayed

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to better portion control my cats meals and to make sure he wasn't missing any in the event I wasn't home at the appropriate feeding times. I love that I can control it from an app on my phone. I can give him snacks when I'm not home and can adjust the portion size as I see fit. It also alerts me when the food is running low, lets me know that it is working properly or a meal doesn't get dispensed when it should. It's easy to use, easy to clean, easy to travel with. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: 2 Paws Up!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my boys LOVE the feeder! I have it set for afternoon snacks and late night... when they hear the dispenser the stop -look in that direction - and RUN for their snacks! I love it in my home. The feeder is clean and stylish. It is highly recommended! One thing - on the app, I wish there was a simple FEED NOW button. The current app requires you to set up a recurring FEED NOW. So if I am going to be late home, I need to set up the feed now and then delete the setting that was established. A simple feed now as a one time snack option would be terrific!
customer_reviews.author: J. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I'm picky about product construction/size, etc. and this one isn't too big or too small. I use it to feed one cat who can be demanding, so I've split her daily dry food allotment into multiple feedings. Plus, it's great for when we do one night out or to give her treat without evening getting up! It fits way more food than expected, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ingasole

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to pair it with my phone in literally an hour! The flashing light setting is 15 seconds! Which isn’t enough time for pairing. And I am sitting right next to my router. No support in the app- all it says try to reset and no possibility to connect to customer care. Major disappointment for this amount of money. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: mariya alayeva

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. The app does not work properly, it did not dispense foods at the right time or in the right portion size. The documentation is sometimes nonsensical and clearly written by a non native English speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mattman91

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Wish there was extra desiccant.
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my life so much easier as my kitty cat does not meow at 3am anymore and wake me up when she is hungry. I can now get a full nights sleep and I am so happy about! My only complaint is with the desiccant -- I wish it came with extra or PetKit sold their own. I purchased a certain brand based off the recommendations in these reviews and they do not fit now i have 50 desiccant bags I cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for automated feeding
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be perfect! It dispenses my cats food just as scheduled and even sends a message to my phone that it has done so. And it notifies me when the food chamber is getting low on food. I love this thing!! Update: I ended up having issues after a month and a half and this company was amazing at resolving the issue. They sent me a replacement, at no charge, and I received it quickly. Thank you so much for a wonderful product and wonderful customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Google wifi router
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to return this Smart Feeder since my Google wifi router is not compatible with this item. You need to have a router that can be set up for 2.4GHz separately. The Google wifi router is “Simultaneous dual-band Wifi (2.4GHz / 5GHz)” which means it cannot have a dedicated channel for 2.4 and it is very very hard for the feeder to connect according to the manufacturer. However, I want to give five stars for their customer service as they were prompt and very helpful to determine the product is not compatible with my router.
customer_reviews.author: sasori

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: SO much better than the mechanical one. I had before. I was worried about spending his much money for it, when there are others for less, but honestly, having it connect with my Alexa, and being able to change setting in the app instead of on my knees at the machine, is a GAME CHANGER.
customer_reviews.author: Silas

customer_reviews.title: Great range of portion sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, and most importantly, has a fantastic range of portion sizes, and up to 10 feedings per 24 hours. Better than any other product I looked at. I wanted to be able to feed my whiny fur child multiple small portions and I can do exactly that with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Agent Smith

customer_reviews.title: No more starving the cats
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I can finally go outta town for about a week without worrying if my two cats are starving or not. The biggest issue I was having is that I set out a about 5 days worth of food by eye ball method. But the cats would just pig out the first two days then have nothing for the last 3 days. Frustrating. So now I get notifications via the app if the unit is low on food or jammed. This unit is well worth every penny! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this one
customer_reviews.text: It's such a relief to find this great auto feeder for my cat. The design is simple and looks sleek. The features are amazing. The app includes a lot of useful things like specific measurements of proteins from the food I'm using. The only thing I would want is a black version to fit with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Kwazii

customer_reviews.title: Way better than our old one. Old one was different brand
customer_reviews.text: This automated cat food feeder is way better than our old one. Our cat used to stick her hand up the chute to jiggle out more food. This one closes so it's super awesome. It's fun to watch this dispense food as well. If I have time I will post a video.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: No more 4am wakeups!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to change one of my cat's eating habits - food, portion size, frequency. It got the point where he was waking me up several times throughout the night. If I fed him too much at one time, I found it later on the floor. If I fed him too little, he cried incessantly. I was looking for a reasonably priced automatic feeder with more than 4 feeding times. This popped up on my Amazon search, and I am *so* glad. It works extremely well, I get a notification every time my cat is fed, and if I need to add more food or change the desiccant packet, I'm notified as well. 5/5. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bartelo

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: The PetKit Mini feeder has a nice clean design. For me, the most beneficial aspect of the device is the ability to schedule a feeding as small as 1/20 cup and to be able to vary the amount for each feeding. The bowl is attached to the unit with a very strong magnet, but it is easy to remove and clean.
customer_reviews.author: CNJerseyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder once you figure out the app (not the most user friendly)
customer_reviews.text: We have this feeder set to go off every 4 hours for our cat piglet and sometimes give one-off treat dispensing. My husband was able to figure out the app, though it's not great. The actual feeder is awesome - we fill about every 10 days, there's plenty of bowl space, and the measurements seem accurate. I also love that when you press the button or feed a treat by the app, it reports that into the whole measurement of food that the cat got for the day. Big fan of metrics. And glad we got this feeder!
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: First 3 days when I bought this item I was trying to connect it after searching I figured out that I should wait for updated version of the app for iOS, once I was able to update the app, I didn’t have any problems with using it. I hope it won’t happen that with new version of iOS I will have difficulties with feeder again. Overall Portions are good size. My cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim Voronov

customer_reviews.title: Great Feeder!
customer_reviews.text: PETKIT could be the new PetSafe. I have used PetSafe for years. He has had like 4 fountains from them. I also had the feeder. PetSafe products worked well for me with no disappointments. But PETKIT is on to something. This is by far the best feeder I have set up. For a newer company but gaining popularity. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

product_meta.title: PETKIT Automatic Cat Feeder, Smart Feed Pet Feeder for Small Animals, Wi-Fi Enabled & Work with Alexa, App for Android and iPhone, Auto Pet Food Dispenser with Portion Control, Battery Back-up System
feature_bullets: FEED FROM YOUR PHONE & ALEXA ENABLED : This automatic pet feeder will make your life much easier, as your cat will not meow at 3am anymore and wake you up when she is hungry. Set a feeding schedule and feed your pet anytime from your smartphone with PETKIT app(Android and iOS ); Ask your Amazon Echo device to feed them a snack. (2.4GHz frequency WIFI, pls.)

PERSONALIZED PET FEEDING : Up to 10 scheduled feedings. Meals can be dispensed from 5g to 50 g( dry food only, kibble size smaller than 0.47 inches). the Feed Now function allows you to feed your pet anytime. Once meal plans are set, the cat feeder automatic will work normally both online and offline
DUO FRESH LOCK SYSTEM : keep the food dry and fresh. The spacious storage bucket keeps up to 3.3 lbs of dry food

WEIGHT SENSOR: You’ll get notices while food bucket is in low condition, you’ll also receive an alert if the food bucket becomes empty; BATTERY BACKUP: When WIFI is not available, you pet still receives the next scheduled feeding. Feeder’s power adapter operated with optional battery backup (requires four 4 AA size alkaline batteries, not included in product kit)

QUALITY GUARANTEED: PETKIT FRESH ELEMENT MINI automatic pet feeder for Cats and Small Animals of Various Sizes, controlling their weight and giving them a healthy life. 24/7/365 professional service and technical support

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
